caption: Okay, so with all the bad reviews here I thought I'd give my two cents. First, the service I received was not bad at all, the cashier was patient even though she was very busy and seemed to be the only one working at the time. I ordered the Hokkaido Miso Ramen and got my food in a very timely manner. No, it certainly wasn't the best ramen I've had (I've had a lot) but it certainly wasn't the worst. Don't be fooled by all the angry reviews here about the bad service and poor quality. Most people rush to leave reviews if they aren't completely satisfied with their dining experience so take the 1 stars with a grain of salt. If you are in the area and really want ramen you can give this place a shot.

Bruh I’m just tryin to get some mochi ice cream and boba tea, but as we were trying to order, the cashier just cut me off and said, with the rudest attitude, “We’re closed” and then she walked off. She  No cap, don’t go there. Get a burger instead
The ramen was terrible.  The toppings were all cold and only the noodles and broth were warm.
Bad quality and so unfriendly. I wish I had seen the other reviews before ordering.

We decided to get boba tea from here and dinner from another place in the food court.  The tea wasn't very good, and the boba was almost hard in the middle.  There was also the issue with price.  It's $3.99 for boba tea, so I was somewhat confused why my total was $9.40 for two. They charge extra for the boba in boba tea. They charge extra for the BOBA in BOBA TEA.  Can you imagine ordering spaghetti and meatballs, only to be charged extra for the meatballs?  If I wanted to overspend on subpar food, I have way too many options in Waikiki to spend as long in line as I did.
This place is nasty. The taste of the soups are worse than the instant ramen. But dont worry, they were compliant about by 2 refunds.
(Translated by Google) The worst taste. You have to worry about giving money and eating. I did not see my review. My tongue rotted.  (Original) 최악의 맛. 돈 주고 먹으라고 해도 고민해야 함. 리뷰 안보고 간 내 잘못ㅜㅜ 혀가 썩는다.
Its taste is terrible and the clerk’s service is also very bad....
